checkIfNotDone

private static boolean checkIfNotDone(int size)

convertToPollingEndpoint

static java.lang.String convertToPollingEndpoint(java.lang.String uri)
converts an endpoint to a polling uri; if a usePolling parameter is false in the endpoint, then the usePolling parameter is removed and the original endpoint is passed. seda endpoints are not polling by default. direct can never be a polling endpoint and will throw an java.lang.IllegalArgumentException if it uses usePolling specified to true.

example: CamelUtils
CamelUtils.convertToPollingEndpoint(
throws:
IllegalArgumentException if endpoint is direct and has the parameter usePolling set to true
Parameters:
uri
Returns:

waits till the specified time limit for messages to complete
throws:
